title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, March 23, 2020
description: Ten years ago on this day, President Barack Obama signed into law the Affordable Care Act, extending healthcare to almost 32 million Americans.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Ten years ago on this day, President Barack Obama signed into law the Affordable Care Act, extending healthcare to almost 32 million Americans.
